title: Understanding Analysis Types
text: In analytical chemistry, different types of analyses are used to determine various properties of a substance. Can you recall the main types of analyses and their purposes?

title: Qualitative vs Quantitative Analysis
text: Qualitative analysis is used to identify the components of a substance, while quantitative analysis measures the amount of each component. Which one is more suitable for identifying the chemical composition?

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Given that the goal is to identify the chemical composition, which type of analysis should be used?
